text: Banak Shöl Hotel () is a historic hotel in the city of Lhasa, Tibet, China. It is located at 8 Beijing Road. The hotel is known for its distinctive wooden verandas. The Nam-Tso Restaurant is located inside the hotel and is popular with tourists visiting Lhasa. ==External links== *Lonely Planet *Wikimapia Category:Hotels in Tibet Category:Buildings and structures in Lhasa
title: Banak Shöl Hotel
